Package com.openxc.sources

Contains classes that generate new vehicle measurements (from USB, Serial, a trace file, etc.).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SourceCallback
    A recipient of measurement updates from a vehicle data source.
    VehicleDataSource
    The interface for all sources of raw vehicle measurements.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationSource
    A "reverse" source to pass externally generated measurements to the callback.
    BaseVehicleDataSource
    A common parent for all vehicle data sources.
    BytestreamConnectingTask  
    BytestreamDataSource
    Common functionality for data sources that read a stream of newline-separated messages in a separate thread from the main activity.
    ContextualVehicleDataSource
    A parent class for data sources that require access to an Android context.
    NativeLocationSource
    Generate location measurements based on native GPS updates.
    PhoneSensorSource
    Generate location measurements based on native GPS updates.
    RemoteListenerSource
    Pass messages from a VehicleService to an in-process callback.
    SourceLogger  
    TestSource  
    WakeLockManager  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DataSourceException  
    DataSourceResourceException  

Package com.openxc.sources Description

Contains classes that generate new vehicle measurements (from USB, Serial, a trace file, etc.).
